scripts.deploy:rinkeby: cross-env NODE_ENV=testNet && pnpm hardhat deploy --network rinkeby
scripts.deploy:polygon:testnet: cross-env NODE_ENV=testNet && pnpm hardhat deploy --network polygonTestNet
scripts.deploy:sepolia: cross-env NODE_ENV=testNet && pnpm hardhat deploy --network sepolia
scripts.deploy:mocks: cross-env NODE_ENV=hardhat && pnpm hardhat deploy --tags mocks
scripts.scripts:fundme: cross-env NODE_ENV=hardhat && pnpm hardhat run scripts/fund.ts --network localhost
scripts.scripts:withdraw: cross-env NODE_ENV=hardhat && pnpm hardhat run scripts/withdraw.ts --network localhost
